com.beaglebuddy.mpeg.enums

Enum StereoMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<StereoMode>
      • com.beaglebuddy.mpeg.enums.StereoMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<StereoMode>

    public enum StereoMode
extends java.lang.Enum<StereoMode>
    The list of stereo modes supported by the LAME encoder.
    See Also:
    LAMEHeader, LAME Header Format
